condition.p: Occasionally on Spring Break, you might get arrested if you do something of questionable legality. Here is what to do if you happen to be arrested.

cause.title: You were caught drinking underage.
cause.p: In all 50 states of the US, if you are under age 21 you cannot drink alcohol. If you use a fake ID or somehow obtain alcohol and consume it, you might be arrested.

step.cmd: Call your mom from the jail cell.
Ask her to pay your bail.
Wait out the next few hours in the drunk tank until you are deemed sober enough to be released.
Lie low for a few days.
